kce: The Belgian Health Care Knowledge Centre
studyTagline: The Belgian Endothelial Surgical Transplant of the Cornea Study (BEST Cornea) is a collaboration between corneal surgeons, tissue bankers, and patients.
studyFullName: A randomised multicentric parallel group pragmatic trial of Descemet Stripping Automated Endothelial Keratoplasty (DSAEK) versus Descemet Membrane Endothelial Keratoplasty (DMEK) in corneal endothelial decompensation
